text: o visvasulara! Miru rahasya samalocanalu ceste - papakaryalu, haddulu miri pravartincatam mariyu pravakta ajnalanu ullanghincatam gurinci kakunda - punyakaryalu mariyu daivabhitiki sambandhincina visayalanu gurinci matrame (rahasya samalocanalu) ceyandi. Mariyu allah patla bhayabhaktulu kaligi undandi. Ayana sannidhilone miru samavesa paracabadataru
